DOC.brief_title: The Effect Administration Low Dose Adrenaline During Surgery Bleeding During Hip Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Hip arthroplasty associate bleeding , anemia need allogeneic transfusion . Administration low-dose adrenaline activate coagulation system may decrease intraoperative immediate postoperative bleeding . Thus , aim study evaluation whether intraoperative IV-administration low-dose adrenaline reduces bleed elective total hip arthroplasty .
